title: Rider transfer ticker: Kanter adds sprint power to Astana, Simmons stays with Lidl-Trek, Tromp named manager of EF
content:
Follow all the main moves of the 2023 'transfer window' for the men's and women's pelotons.

Read the full article at Rider transfer ticker: Kanter adds sprint power to Astana, Simmons stays with Lidl-Trek, Tromp named manager of EF on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
